attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BAN THESE DEATH TRAPS NOW!
DONT DO THE USUAL GOVERNMENT THING OF WAITING UNTIL SOMEONE IS KILLED OR MAIMED AND THEN HAVE AN INQUIRY. FOR ONCE TAKE PREVENTATIVE ACTION.
AFTER ALL IT COULD BE ONE OF YOUR FAMILY (GOD FORBID)

rejection.details: Please rewrite in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
